game_description: No matter if you are an architect or an amateur photographer, with theViewer you can create VR tours from 360 images in minutes and immediately view them together with your client thanks to our Shared Experience functionality and Oculus Avatars. Visit theViewer.co to find out more about special features like : - magic links - shared experience - embedded VR and many more .
review_2: Some places are in 3d VR and others are just 360 degre pictures. Not bad at all.
review_3: The name is confusing. This is not a VR media player. It's VR real estate stuff. IIRC it had tons of locations. The Daydream version seems to just have a sampling. It's mostly 360 pictorials of posh condos, and thats a guilty pleasure of mine.
